snippet: This sport utility vehicle has many advantages, including a third row, but at almost $50,000, it’s an expensive way to save gas.
abstract: Driven column review of 2016 Toyota Highlander.
lead_paragraph: This sport utility vehicle has many advantages, including a third row, but at almost $50,000, it’s an expensive way to save gas.

headline.print_headline: Toyota Highlander Hybrid Offers Room and Fuel Economy
headline.main: Video Review: Toyota Highlander Hybrid Offers Room and Fuel Economy
